epic.title: Messaging and Communication
epic.description: Develop the core communication features for the Real-Time Chat and Video Calling Application, enabling users to exchange messages and participate in video calls with minimal latency.

stories.title: Real-Time Text Chat
stories.description: Implement a real-time text messaging feature allowing users to send and receive messages instantly, with typing indicators and conversation history.
acceptanceCriteria: Messages are delivered to recipients within 1 second under normal network conditions.
Messages appear in the chat window without requiring a page refresh.
Users can see when the other party is typing in the conversation window.
Messages are stored and can be retrieved in conversation history with correct timestamps.

tasks.title: Integrate Backend Messaging Service
tasks.description: Connect frontend components to the backend messaging API for sending and receiving messages in real time.

tasks.title: Implement Typing Indicators
tasks.description: Enable websocket-based typing notifications to display remote user typing status.

tasks.title: Develop Conversation History Retrieval
tasks.description: Fetch and display stored messages from the backend when loading a chat thread.

tasks.title: Optimize Message Delivery Latency
tasks.description: Ensure message propagation latency stays under 1 second using efficient, persistent connections.

stories.title: Video Calling
stories.description: Enable one-to-one and group video calls with real-time audio and video streaming up to 4 participants, including adaptive quality and low latency.
acceptanceCriteria: Users can initiate and receive one-to-one video calls successfully.
Audio and video latency is less than 300ms under normal conditions.
Support for at least 4 participants in a group video call.
Call quality dynamically adjusts based on current network conditions.
End-to-end encryption is applied to all calls.

tasks.title: Integrate WebRTC or Similar Technology
tasks.description: Use WebRTC APIs for establishing peer-to-peer media connection and streaming.

tasks.title: Set Up Signaling Server
tasks.description: Implement signaling mechanism to exchange session details between peers.

tasks.title: Build Group Call Support
tasks.description: Handle media streams and layout for multiple participants, ensuring smooth performance.

tasks.title: Implement Adaptive Bitrate Streaming
tasks.description: Adjust video quality dynamically according to available bandwidth.

tasks.title: Enable End-to-End Encryption
tasks.description: Secure media streams using encryption protocols to protect user privacy.

notes: Assumed that the application will be web-based with potential mobile support. No details provided on authentication, user management, or platform scope. Dependencies such as authentication, backend services, and signaling servers are assumed available before implementing the stories.
